Introduction

Kim Wonpil is a South Korean singer and musician under JYP Entertainment, best known as the lead vocalist, synthesizer, and keyboardist of the rock band DAY6.

He debuted with DAY6 on September 7, 2015, with the EP "The Day" and the lead single "Congratulations." In addition to his role in the band, Wonpil has been actively involved in songwriting and production.

On February 7, 2022, he made his solo debut with his first full-length album, "Pilmography," further showcasing his musical versatility and artistry.
